summary.title: Threat Model
summary.description: Web-based tool designed to support cybersecurity risk evaluations for Air Traffic Management solutions under the SESAR programme.

threats.title: Server Spoofing
threats.description: Malicious server mimics app endpoint, intercepts credentials.

threats.title: Misconfigured ACL
threats.description: Insufficient role checks allow low-privileged user to perform admin actions.
threats.mitigation: Enforce fine-grained RBAC, unit-test access rules.

threats.title: Credential Brute-Force
threats.description: Automated login attempts to guess passwords.

threats.title: Log Deletion
threats.description: Attacker removes logs to erase evidence.
threats.mitigation: Store logs in append-only storage, replicate off-site.

threats.title: Catalog Tampering
threats.description: Unauthorized edits of predefined catalog entries.
threats.mitigation: Enforce RBAC on catalog updates, audit all modifications.

threats.title: Unencrypted Data.
threats.description: Backups stored unencrypted, exposing sensitive data.
threats.mitigation: Encrypt all data at rest and backups with strong keys.

threats.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
threats.description: Malicious script injected into UI, executes in another user’s browser.
threats.mitigation: Sanitize/encode output; deploy strong Content Security Policy.

threats.title: Denial of Logging
threats.description: Provide a description for this threat

threats.title: SQL Injection
threats.description: Unvalidated inputs allow arbitrary SQL commands on the database.
threats.mitigation: Use parameterized queries/ORM; apply strict input validation.
